items.sentence: You're interested in a career in foreign relations, aren't you?

Esperanto is the most spoken constructed language in the world.
I don't waste my time arguing with pigheaded fanatics like you.
They decided not to announce that they intended to get married.
Moving to a new country can be both exhilarating and stressful.
Tom knew that Mary told everyone she was going to go to Boston.
One thing that I don't like about Tom is that he's always late.
I'm not certain that Tom is the one that I need to worry about.
